payload.message:
Daily AI automation news task.

**TOPICS TO SEARCH:**
1. OpenClaw
2. Antigravity (AI agent platform)
3. Claude/Anthropic
4. AI agent automation systems

**CHANNELS TO CHECK:**
- Julian Goldie SEO
- Alex Finn (@AlexFinnOfficial)
- Nate B Jones (@NateBJones)
- Matthew Berman
- Peter Yang

**FORMAT RULES:**
- Max 3 videos per channel (pick highest view count if more)
- For each video, include a 1-2 sentence ACTUAL SUMMARY of what the video covers based on transcript — not just the title
- Group by category (Claude/Anthropic, OpenClaw, AI Agents, etc.)
- Include channel status section at bottom

**EXAMPLE FORMAT:**
• "Video Title" - Channel Name (duration, time ago)
  ↳ Actual summary of content: what you learn, key takeaway, main point covered.

**COST OPTIMIZATION:**
- Use DeepSeek V3 for transcript summarization (bulk text work)
- Use Claude only for orchestration, formatting final output, and delivery

**DELIVERY:**
Send compiled brief to Cody via Telegram. If no new relevant videos found, send short 'no new videos today' message.
Run your nightly health check now. Execute all 7 checks as defined in your AGENTS.md brain prompt, compile the report, and deliver it to Cody via Telegram. If status is CRITICAL, flag it prominently.

state.lastError: Error: Slack bot token missing for account "default" (set channels.slack.accounts.default.botToken or SLACK_BOT_TOKEN for default).

payload.message: Begin your nightly improvement cycle. Current time is 2:05 AM CST. Hard stop at 5:30 AM. Follow your 5-phase protocol: Harvest → Diagnose → Prescribe → Apply → Report. Budget cap: $8. Deliver morning brief to Telegram when complete.

payload.text: ⏰ Weekly CRO Auto-Deploy Check: Spawn Razor to run weekly CRO workflow for auto-deploy enabled clients.
⏰ Weekly Campaign Auto-Optimization Check: Spawn Blitz to run weekly campaign optimization workflow for auto-optimize enabled campaigns.

payload.message: WEEKLY STANDUP TRIGGER: Orchestrate the Sunday standup. Spawn Silas (SEO patterns/audits this week), Lookout (rank tracking anomalies/trends), and Ledger (API spend/profitability trends). Collect their reports, synthesize into a unified weekly rollup, and deliver to Cody. Include: what shipped, what's blocked, what needs attention, cross-agent insights.
